title: Home | Sundo Acupuncture
description: Sundo offers Acupuncture treatments by a certified acupuncturist, and Breathing Meditation Classes.
cleaned_text: top of page SUNDO ACUPUNCTURE Your Path to Wellness starts here Holistic medicine is the art and science of healing that addresses the whole person - mind, body and spirit. As a practitioner of holistic medicine, I integrate conventional and acupuncture therapies to prevent and treat disease, and most importantly, to promote optimal health. I invite you to join me on this wonderful journey of healing. OUR SERVICES Healing Therapies We offer a variety of services, including Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, and Breathing Meditation Classes. We accept most insurances. Call us today to schedule your appointment! bottom of page
